Time for another gonna wait the translation

Trying to fit the story into tag definition? ^^; | The guy is married, if that answers the question. On weekend, Natsuki (the daughter) is going to travel with her mother. Her classmates even ask why her father is not included, but she said he will just be rolling around lazily at home like usual. Although with her attitude, she probably would told him to not go with them, so he is cleaning up the house. Shiori, the other girl, heard it and took the chance to approach him. | They both had grew distant from their own family. Unsure if Shiori's father is dead or divorced, but her mom is the type who is working and got no time for her (she doesn't go to the sports competition on weekend). Meanwhile, the MC's daughter also doesn't want to get associated with him (because he's not a handsome guy like her classmate's dad). So in a way, both are filling the emptiness of what has been lost from them (a warm and loving father figure, and a daughter who loves her father).
Art suck as always

No, this still doesn't count as cheating, since according to the girl herself, she says that "Let me rape you, so it wouldn't count as cheating".(P.18-19) So I guess this doesn't count as cheating lol. Btw, manga is wholesome as heaven and I love it
Cheating? I would understand if he is married or if the FMC has a boyfriend, but there’s nothing reference to that xD

It's cheating because the fat guy is the father of the twin tails girl. At the start what we are seeing is an sport activity with the parents. The daughter is sulking because her father is fat and is embarrassing. Meanwhile the mc is sad because her father passed away. And it's cheating because the guy is probably married.
Where's the cheating?! He is just chubby, not bastard or ugly...and she looks happy!! wholesome 👏✨✨✨
